attributes.action: Supermarkets to pick up litter within 300 metres of stores
attributes.additional_details:
Major Supermarkets to take reputability pick up litter from their own stores that lines the streets within a 300 metre radius . Not only will this reduce litter, and protect the environment but it will save the local councils money on having to clear the streets. If supermarkets want to maintain a healthy brand they would agree to this.

If there  is more than one supermarket in the given radius the stores should come to an agreement themselves
